body:
This looks great -- fits in really well with the intent of each field. Just one note that the "extra" field should be key/value even when recording.

> I'm not interested in verifying this with json schema at this point.

FWIW, if @gregglind is talking about writing a schema for server-side use, that should be unnecessary -- these events should start showing up in main_summary and the exploded Events table as soon as normandy starts sending them without any additional server-side work.
